adjective.description: Of or relating to the ancient Roman province of Rhaetia or the region of the Alps corresponding to this; = "Rhaetian".

noun.description: Geology= "Rhaetian". Also (chiefly in plural): rocks or strata of the Rhaetian stage (now rare).
Frequently in form Raetic. The ancient language spoken in the Roman province of Rhaetia; = "Rhaetian".

origin: Early 17th century. From French rhétique and its etymon classical Latin Rhaeticus (also Raeticus) from Rhaetia + -icus.
